_comment: Only translate from this file, not the others!
lf_title: Tox: A New Kind of Instant Messaging
sect1_description: With the rise of government monitoring programs, Tox provides an easy to use application that allows you to connect with friends and family without anyone else listening in. While other big-name services require you to pay for features, Tox is totally free, and comes without advertising.
sect1_nightly: You can download Tox nightlies; be forewarned, they may be buggy!
download_warning: Nightlies aren't for the weak of heart, you may encounter bugs, crashes, and large doses of frustration. You've been warned!
sect2_aboutbody: Nowadays, every government seems to be interested in what we're saying online. Tox is built on a "privacy goes first" agenda, and we make no compromises. Your safety is our top priority, and there isn't anything in the world that will change that.
sect3_messages_blurb:
At your fingertips.
 You're always in the loop with instant encrypted messaging.
sect3_voice_blurb:
Stay in touch.
 Make free and secure Tox to Tox calls.
sect3_video_blurb:
Seeing is believing.
 Catch up face to face with a secure video call.
sect4_principles: Instant messaging, video conferencing, and more
sect4_security_blurb:
Tox takes your privacy seriously.
With leading-class encryption, you can rest assured knowing that the only people reading your messages are the ones you send them to.
sect4_easy_blurb: Unlike other secure messaging solutions, Tox does not require you to be a computer programmer to use it. Tox comes out-of-the-box with an easy-to-use interface that allows you to focus on your conversations.
sect4_freedom_blurb: Tox is both free for you to use, and free for you to change. You are completely free to both use and modify Tox. Furthermore, Tox will never harass you with ads, or require you to pay for features.
sect6_developers: We're cool folks from all around the world.
sect6_mailinglist: Subscribe to our mailing list for updates about Tox's progress.
sect6_githubtoirc: Start your own project and ask us on GitHub, or in IRC!
donate_about: To see how you can help out by donating, please visit our donations wiki article. Thank you!
